Text: Have you donated blood in the last 6 months?
Have you ever been rejected as a blood donor?
Do you currently feel healthy and rested enough to donate blood?
Have you eaten anything prior to your arrival to donate blood?
Did you drink any alcohol in the last 6 hours?
Have you had any tattoos or piercings done in the last 6 months?
Have you ever consumed any type of opioids?
Have you ever had unsafe sexual intercourse with a person suffering from HIV?
